page.title: 15NORTH KIRK, PENICUIK
page.content: It was built in {1867.}There are {67 {elders}and{Mr Fraser(the minister)}has baptised 6 people this year.There are {920 members.}There has been{10 {ministers. Mr Comrie}was the first minister and{Mr Fraser}is the latest.He started being a minister in 1971 so he has been a minister for 14 years.There is a{women's club}and a {men's club}and a very large{Boy's {Brigade}which has Anchor Boys, Juniors and Company Sections. He has{summer {services; one at half past nine and {one at eleven o'clock.}After the services they have coffee and tea and some biscuits. In the{winter}Mr Fraser goes in at ten o'clock and the service starts at{eleven o'clock.
